about_the_game:
Created by the developer Bandage and Go Studio, this is an open-world Three Kingdoms role-playing game blending historical and fictional elements.

"Path of Ambition: The Sun Rise" narrates a story set in the late Eastern Han Dynasty of China, a time of rampant monsters, weaving through historical and fictional tales. Players embody a young character in this tumultuous era, battling monsters while pursuing their own ambitions. The Qilin, traditionally a symbol of a prosperous era, becomes a sign of turbulent times when prefixed with 'Mythical,' and this concept forms the core of the game.

Uniqueness One: A Distinct Three Kingdoms World
Set in China, AD 179, the game portrays a young character in a world overrun by monsters, scripting their life's story. Along the way, players might encounter historical figures with unusual portrayals or play parts in historical events, leading these to familiar outcomes or entirely different developments.

Uniqueness Two: Changeable Open Paths
Rich in narrative driven by multiple choices, players can follow the main storyline, focus on eliminating monsters, or remain indifferent and detached, each choice leading to its unique conclusion. Unrestricted to a single identity, players can become doctors, merchants, or wander among different factions, shaping their life's journey in this world full of opportunities.

Uniqueness Three: The Unpredictability of Dice Style
Life is not always smooth sailing; fate is ever-changing. The game integrates elements of dice determination from Dungeons and Dragons into event choices, character interactions, odd jobs, duels, etc., adding unique variables to the gameplay.

Uniqueness Four: Diverse Choices of Development
Emphasizing personal growth, players choose to develop their abilities based on individual ideas, thereby adopting different approaches to overcome challenges, influencing numerous events, and encountering various endings.

Uniqueness Five: Continuous World Exploration
Venturing into unknown territories, exploring every path and region, discovering hidden bandit lairs, caves, and even unexpected encounters. Even familiar places might offer new insights due to players' actions. As familiarity grows, new discoveries emerge, gradually completing the player's map.

content_descriptors.notes: In the game, there will be brothels, gambling venues, corpses, and some dialogue choices that are considered immoral.

short_description: Path of Ambition is a story-rich, choice-matter RPG set in an open world inspired by Dungeons & Dragons. Begin as a humble ranger to become a lord, a business magnate, a benevolent healer, or maintain your noble spirit as a folk hero. Shape your destiny in a realm teeming with monsters and legends.
